scripts.build: docker build -t ghcr.io/tkottke90/svg-path-gen:$(node ./bin/getVersion) --build-arg "COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD)" --build-arg "BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)"  .
scripts.release: npm run version -r minor && npm run compile && npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.release-major: npm run version -r major && npm run compile && npm run build && npm run publish
